Evansville.Academy for Innovative Studies (Evansvil: The Academy for Innovative Studies are two campuses located on Diamond Avenue and First Avenue in Evansville, Indiana, USA. It is a member of the Evansville Vanderburgh School Corporation. In 2012, the EVSC School Board decided to invest more money in students who are at risk and learn differently from traditional student and open another AIS campus.The new AIS campus at the old North High School was opened in fall 2012. AIS serves about 375 kids across both campuses.
